DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation clinical performance two toric contact lenses 2-week , single mask ( subject ) , daily wear , randomize , bilateral , parallel group study .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Two Silicone Hydrogel Toric Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Be 18 45 year age . Sign Written Informed Consent ( See separate document ) . Be exist successful daily wear toric soft contact lens . Require visual correction eye ( monovision uniocular fit NOT allow ) . Does require presbyopic correction ( read J1 @ normal read distance ) . Have sphere requirement range 1.00 5.00D ( 5.25D refractive ) Have refractive astigmatism 0.75D 2.50D eye . Achieve visual acuity 20/30 good eye spherical distance correction . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : No amblyopia . No evidence lid abnormality infection . No conjunctival abnormality infection . No clinically significant slit lamp finding ( i.e . stromal edema , vascularisation , infiltrate abnormal opacity ) . No active ocular disease . Requires concurrent ocular medication . Clinically significant ( Grade 3 4 ) corneal stromal haze , corneal vascularisation , tarsal abnormality , bulbar hyperemia , limbal hyperemia , abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Corneal stain Grade 3 one region . Has refractive surgery . Has eye injury/surgery within 8 week immediately prior enrolment study . Abnormal lacrimal secretion . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Keratoconus corneal irregularity . Polymethyl methacrylate ( PMMA ) Rigid Gas Permeable ( RGP ) lens wear previous 8 week Extended lens wear last 3 month . Any systemic illness would contraindicate lens wear medical treatment would affect vision successful lens wear . Diabetic . Infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . Pregnancy , lactate plan pregnancy time enrolment . Participation concurrent clinical trial last 60 day .
